title: cant see friends
body: cant see friends or open chat to message them continues to say logging on to chat services

replies.body: It sounds like you're having an issue with your network connecting to the chat servers.  If this is continuing to happen, I recommend using our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to troubleshoot whatever is causing that to happen.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help, including automatically configuring your firewall settings.  Let me know if you have any questions!
